text: Gomɗii Alla Goonginanii on Fodoore Makko nden tuma nde waraynoɗon ɓe e Duŋayee Makko, haa nde cooyɗon lurruɗon e fiyaake ɗen, yedduɗon ɓaawo o hollii on ko yiɗuɗon. No e mon ɓen faalaaɓe aduna, no e mon kadi ɓen faalaaɓe laakara. Hooti O Yiili on e maɓɓe fii yo O Ndaarndo on. Gomɗii O Yaafanike on. Alla ko Jom Ɓural e dow gomɗimɓe ɓen
